org.youscope.serverinterfaces

Interface YouScopeServerProperties

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface YouScopeServerProperties
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface providing information of the configuration and installed addons of the YouScope server.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerAddon[] getGeneralAddons()
      Returns an array of all general purpose addons known by the server.

      • getServerAddon

        <T extends ServerAddon> T getServerAddon(java.lang.Class<T> addonInterface)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a remote addon provider implementing the given interface. This is a general purpose function designed to allow for specialized addon types. The interface of the addon has to be known by the client. If more than one addon implements the given interface, the first one found is returned. If no addon implements the interface, null is returned. See the description of the interface GeneralPurposeAddon for more details.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The interface of the addon.
        Parameters:
        addonInterface - The interface of the addon.
        Returns:
        An addon implementing the given interface, or null, if no addon could be found.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getServerAddons

        <T extends ServerAddon> T[] getServerAddons(java.lang.Class<T> addonInterface)
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns all remote addon providers implementing the given interface. This is a general purpose function designed to allow for specialized addon types. The interface of the addon has to be known by the client. If no addon implements the interface, an empty array is returned. See the description of the interface GeneralPurposeAddon for more details.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The interface of the addons.
        Parameters:
        addonInterface - The interface of the addons.
        Returns:
        An array of addons implementing the given interface, or an empty array, if no addon could be found.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getGeneralAddons

        ServerAddon[] getGeneralAddons()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns an array of all general purpose addons known by the server.
        Returns:
        Array of general purpose addons, or an empty list, if no addon is known.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
